### IEmacs.EscAbort method
</br>


#### Sets whether the escape key should abort the input.

```csharp
public IEmacs EscAbort(bool escAbort = true)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| escAbort | If set to `true`, the escape key will abort and clear the input. |

### Return Value

The current [`IEmacs`](../IEmacs.md) instance.
